summary: THE RADIO THAT CONTROLS THE AIR AND HEAT CALLS FOR HELP 911 AND BACKS UP CAMERAL NAVIGATOR TO PLACE  GO IN AND OUT IT HAS A VERY BAD ELECTRICAL PROBLEM THAT SHUT THE CAR DOWN. IT ALSO CALLS 911 SERVER TIMES.
Vehicle radio is delaminating. Screen continually beeps and changes temp, radio while driving. Creates a safety concern on the road.

The vehicle's LCD screen has become delaminated which causes the control of the radio, air conditioning, navigation, and other features controlled by the "radio" portion of the car to become dysfunctional. The car will randomly beep, change air temperatures, start navigation, cause the loss of hands-free communication. This is a safety hazard as it causes the driver to be distracted in order to attend to the incessant beeping and issues related to AC/heat, navigation or radio (volume, etc.). This appears from Chrysler Forums to be an issue among a large group of Chrysler 300 Year Model 2017-19 owners. I am encouraging them to file a concern with your group and to ask for a recall of the car for this reason.

The contact owns a 2017 Chrysler 300. The contact stated that while driving at an undisclosed speed, the display screen intermittently failed, which caused the navigation system to become inoperable. The display screen controls the navigation and HVAC system. The contact who is deaf and relied on the navigation system for commuting. The vehicle was taken to an independent mechanic and diagnosed that the display screen might fail due to the high temperatures in Florida. The display screen needed to be replaced. The vehicle was not repaired. The manufacturer was made aware of the failure but informed the contact that there was no recall associated with the VIN and the vehicle was out of warranty. The failure mileage was approximately 53,000.
The door panels of all the doors are falling apart, car is only 4 years old.

The Uconnect screen has delamination in it that is causing ghost punches on the touch screen. I have ad this screen replaced back in 2018 for the same issue and its now doing the same thing. It is very distracting when it starts to call people due to the ghost touches or its messing with the radio or general setting for the car.
radio freeze up and go black  which stops me from using rear camera
My door panels on my 17 300 are warped and you have to slam the door to make sure they close and they pose a risk of the side airbags not to deploy and effect the flow of air from the heat and a/c

Filling up the gas results in a strong odor of gas in the cabin and gas leaking out of the right rear wheel well. Also caused the engine to sputter and turn off.   Found content in the https://www.300cforums.com/ forum that speaks of the issue.
Every time I shift my shift knob from drive to reverse or vice versa. I hear a clunk in the transmission.  Like as if my transmission is slipping.

The center console control that has your heat ,radio ,seat heat control,car temperature control as well as phone and navigation system started acting nuts.Dash started running navigation system to random destinations with distance and time then it would switch to phone and start calling random phone numbers in my contact list.tried to call 911 and could not connect and told me to try calling from my cell phone.like another report i read about this separation of glass on this display may very well be the cause but don’t know for sure. This is the first time I had this problem and with today’s computers on these new cars I worry if it will start taking over control of car functions and drivability issues.I have been a mechanic for more than 40 years and never seen anything like this.Hope someone will look into this problem before someone gets hurt.

THE SCREEN ON THE VEHICLE IS SEPARATING FROM THE BACK SIDE OF THE SCREEN CREATING A STREAKING EFFECT THAT WILL AUTOMATICALLY PUSH BUTTONS WHILE DRIVING OR TURN THE RADIO ON AND OFF.  THIS IS THE MAIN SYSTEM FOR THE CAR CONTROLS AND CAN CAUSE DRIVER SAFETY ISSUES.
THE FRONT DRIVER AND FRONT PASSENGER DOOR PANELS ARE PEELING UP AND CONTINUE TO DO SO WHICH WILL EVENTUALLY IMPEDE THE ABILITY FOR THE DOOR LOCKS TO ENGAGE OR DISENGAGE PROPERLY.
THE DOOR PANEL ON THE PASSENGER SIDE IS WARPING AND  POPPING OUT AND COMING APART - THIS HAPPENED ABOUT A MONTH AGO

AFTER I FEEL THE VEHICLE UP WITHOUT TOPPING OFF THE VEHICLE STARTS RUNNING ROUGH AFTER ABOUT 10-15 MINUTES. THE CAR SHUTS OFF AND ERROR MESSAGE COMES UP TO PUT THE CAR IN PARK AND THEN SELECT DESIRED GEAR. THE ENTIRE TIME YOU CAN SMELL GAS BECAUSE THE CAR IS LEAKING FUEL FROM THE RIGHT REAR WHEELHOUSE AREA. THIS IS VERY UNSAFE. I WAS JUST DRIVING ON I95 AND THIS HAPPENED TO ME. THIS VEHICLE COULD HAVE CAUSED A PILE UP ON THE HIGHWAY. PEOPLE COULD HAVE DIED. RECALL

IN JUST HAD TO SCHEDULE TO OAY 800 SOME FOR THIS PART BECAUSE ITS ON RECALL AND ONLY THE DEALERHIP THAT HAS IT IS NOT WILLING TO SELL PART UNLESS I GET SERVICED THE .ENGINE OIL FILTER HOUSING PART NUMBER 68310865 IS LEAKING AND PART IS ON BACK ORDER FROM CHRYSLER, THEY STATED IT IS COMMON PROBLEM. THIS SHOULD BE A RECALL.

UCONNECT RADIO DELAMINATION. UNABLE TO CONTROL MANY VEHICLE FEATURES AS RADIO JUMPS AROUND. COULD NOT GET CLIMATE CONTROL TO DIRECT HEATED AIR DURING THIS TEXAS WINTER STORM. RADIO CONTROLS ALL SETTING AND RADIO WILL JUMP AROUND CHANGING SETTING ON IT'S OWN.
ENGINE OIL FILTER HOUSING  PART NUMBER 68310865 IS LEAKING AND PART IS ON BACK ORDER FROM CHRYSLER, THEY STATED IT IS COMMON PROBLEM. THIS SHOULD BE A RECALL.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED ALL FOUR DOOR PANELS WERE DELAMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE LOCAL DEALER SAN DIEGO CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM (777 CAMINO DEL RIO S, SAN DIEGO, CA 92108, (619) 224-4151) AND WERE MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE HAD NOT BEEN DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED AS OF YET. THE MANUFACTURER HAD NOT BEEN INFORMED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 34,000.
INTERIOR TRIM OF CHRYSLER 300 WARPING. COMMON ISSUE AS I UNDERSTAND WITH ALL THE COMPLAINTS ONLINE.
I WAS REAR ENDED REAL HARD MY AIRBAG LIGHTS CAME ON BUT THE AIRBAGS DIDN'T COME OUT WHY IS THAT?

ROTORS ARE WARPED PER MAINTENANCE CHECK WHICH I BELIEVE IS FROM THE EMERGENCY BREAKING. 43400 MILES FROM LEISURELY DRIVING AND BRAKE PADS ARE STILL GOOD. WHEN I'M DRIVING DOWNHILL AND APPLY BREAKS, CAR STARTS TO VIBRATE. THEN AT TIMES OF HIGH SPEED OF 70-75 THE BLIND SPOT WARNING LIGHT COMES ON AND THE SIDE SENSORS STAY ON UNTIL I COME TO A COMPLETE STOP.
DRIVER SIDE INTERIOR MOLDING IS COMING APART, MOLDING IS COMING APART WHERE IT MEETS WITH THE DOOR ON TOP BY WINDOW.

I AM EXPERIENCING A KNOW DEFECT IN CHRYSLER VEHICLES WHERE THE INTERIOR DOOR PANELS ARE SEPARATING AND WARPING AT THE WINDOW LINE. THIS CAN CAUSE THE SIDE AIRBAGS TO NOT DEPLOY CORRECTLY AND MAY INTERFERE WITH THE OPERATION OF THE DOOR LOCKS.

BLANK SCREEN, VOICE SCRAMBLED WITH INCOMING AND OUT GOING CALLS AND I HAVE TO PRESS THE HOLD BUTTON AND IMMEDIATELY PRESS OFF TO RECOVER CONVERSATIONS.  RADIO SCREEN LOOKS AS IF THERE IS SCREEN PEELING FROM INSIDE THE SCREEN.  MOST OF SCREEN IS CLEAR AND LOOKS AS IT SHOULD BUT ABOUT AN INCH FROM THE TOP IS A DIFFERENT COLOR.  THE SCREEN IS CONSTANTLY FLIPPING FROM 1 SCREEN TO ANOTHER.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PASSENGER'S AND DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR PANEL DETACHED FROM THE VEHICLE WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO FULLERTON CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE RAM (1050 US HIGHWAY 22, SOMERVILLE, NJ 08876) WHERE IT WAS INSPECTED HOWEVER, NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THERE WERE NO RECALLS UNDER THE VIN. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 31,000.
BOTH PASSENGER AND DRIVER SIDE DOOR PANELS BECOME WARPED AND EXPOSE THE INSIDES OF SAID DOORS.
DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE PANELS ARE SEPARATING FOR UNKNOWN REASONS. THE DRIVERS SIDE IS NEARLY COVERING THE LOCK AND MAY INFRINGE ON VIEW FROM SIDE VIEW MIRROR.

THE BACK UP CAMERA DOES NOT FUNCTION. THE CAR HAS 50,000 MILES AND LESS THAN 3 YEARS OLD.   NO DAMAGE WAS DONE TO THE UNIT, IT JUST BEGAN NOT FUNCTIONING PROPERLY.  UNABLE TO VIEW ANYTHING FROM THE CAMERA VIEW WHEN ENGAGED.

JUMPED A VEHICLE AT AROUND 110000 MILES ECM MODULE DRAINING BATTERY ACCORDING TO DEALER CODE P1DF3. KNOWN PROBLEM AMONG MULTIPLE CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP PRODUCTS WHEN I DID A QUICK WEB SEARCH. ECM FAULTY REQUIRES FULL DISCHARGE WITH BATTERY CABLES REMOVED. DID NOT WORK FOR ME HAD TO GO TO DEALERSHIP TO GET THEM TO FLASH AND RESET IF I DID NOT HAVE A WARRANTY THEY WOULD HAVE CHARGED ME.
MY CAR NEEDS1500 FOR ALL ROTORS AND NEW BRAKES PADS AND LABOR. DONT UNDERSTAND IF WHY MY ROTORS GAVE PUT SO FAST.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED THE DRIVER'S SIDE REAR AND PASSENGER SIDE FRONT DOOR PANEL WERE DETACHED FROM THE DOOR FRAME. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO TEXAN DODGE CHRYSLER JEEP RAM 18555 EASTEX FWY, HUMBLE, TX 77338 (281) 973-3844, TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE DOOR PANEL NEEDED TO BE REPLACED DUE TO HEAT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 25,000.
SCREEN APPEARS TO SHOW DELAMINATION. AT TIMES IT CAUSES THE SCREEN NOT TO FUNCTION PROPERLY. CURRENTLY WE ARE NOW SEEING THAT THE DELAMINATION IS SPREADING ON THE SCREEN.  *TR

MY DOOR PANELS ARE WARPING MY CAR IS 3 YEARS OLD AND IS EXTREMELY TOO SOON TO BE EXPERIENCING THIS KIND OF DAMAGE. IF FOR WHATEVER REASON IT CAUSES DAMAGE TO MY AIRBAGS IT'S PUTTING ME AND MY CHILD AT RISK OF SERIOUS INJURY.

WHEN PUTTING MY CAR IN REVERSE, THE SCREEN THAT SHOWS MY BACKUP CAMERA WENT OUT, CAME BACK ON, FLICKERED AND FLASHED.  I BUMPED INTO A SMALL TREE NEAR MY DRIVEWAY.  THIS IS ALSO VERY DANGEROUS WHEN BACKING OUT OF A PARKING SPACE.  I CANNOT TURN MY SCREEN OFF IF I AM IN REVERSE SO THE SCREEN CONTINUES TO FLASH, TURN BRIGHT BLUE AND MAKES IT VERY UNSAFE AND DIFFICULT TO EVEN SEE USING MY SIDE MIRRORS.  VERY SELDOM DOES THE CAMERA/SCREEN WORK CORRECTLY.

I HAVE A 2017 CHRYSLER 300S WITH 10,000 MILES ON IT AND THE FRONT BUMPER KEEP HANGING LOWER ON THE DRIVER SIDE. I TOOK IT IN TO THE CHRYSLER BODYSHOP AND THE TRY TO FIX IT AND THEM SAY THEY REPLACE THE BUMPER WITH A NEW ONE AND I STILL HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM. THE FRONT IS ABOUT TO COME OFF FROM MY CAR!!! THERE NEED TO BE A RECALL ON THE FRONT BUMPER OF THE CHRYSLER 300 FRONT BUMPERS!!! THIS IS THE 5 TIME THAT I HAVE TAKEN THIS CAR TO THE SHOP ABOUT THIS BUMPER!!! PLEASE HELP!!

THE FRONT LIGHTS PROJECTION IS EXTREMELY NARROW. WHEN TURNING LEFT OR RIGHT ONTO A DARK DRIVE OR ROADWAY IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SEE UNTIL THE VEHICLE GETS MOSTLY THROUGH THE TURN. LAST WEEK I NEARLY HIT A PEDESTRIAN BECAUSE I COULD NOT SEE HER. I VISITED YOU WEB SITE TO CHECK ON A DRIVE TRAIN RECALL AND NOTICE ANOTHER DRIVER HAS THE SAME LIGHTING PROBLEM. THE ID # IS 11064345.

WHEN AC IS ON THERE IS A STRONG ODOR OF GASOLINE EVERY TIME WE TURN AC ON OR IF THE CAR IS IN USE FOR A LONG TIME THE ODOR IS VERY STRONG IN THE CAR, SINCE THIS ISSUE STARTED THE CAR HAS BEEN USING MORE GASOLINE AND I HAVE TO FILL UP THE TANK MORE TIMES THAN USUAL. MY CAR IS STILL UNDER MANUFACTURES WARRANTY AND I SCHEDULED A SERVICE WITH CHRYSLER TO HAVE IT CHECKED OUT BUT THEY DID NOT WANT TO TAKE THE VEHICLE IN TO A SERVICE TECH BECAUSE NO ENGINE LIGHT OR NO CODE WAS PRESENT\. I HAVE TRIED TO GET THEM TO INSPECT THE FUEL LINES TO CHECK IF THERE IS A LEAK OR HAVE THEM CHECK THE AC TO SEE IF THEY CAN FIND THE CAUSE OF THE STRONG ODOR THAT WE GET WITH THE AC ON BUT HAVE HAD NO LUCK. I AM TO THE POINT THAT I AM WORRIED FOR MY HEALTH AND MY CHILDREN'S HEALTH DUE TO THE STRONG GASOLINE ODOR.

THE ISSUES I'M HAVING WITH 2017 CHRYSLER 300 IS EVERY TIME I CHANGE INTO GEARSHIFT  ESPECIALLY THE REVERSE GEAR THE SHAFT OR THE AXLE ARE NOT WORKING PROPERLY. WHEN I CHECKED IF THERE HAS BEEN ANY POWERTRAIN RECALLS I FOUND SEVERAL OF THEM, BUT WHEN I CHRYSLER HQ THEY TOLD ME THERE'S NO RECALL BUT I'M HAVING THESE PROBLEMS WITH THE CAR STILL.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. ON THREE SEPARATE OCCASIONS, THE VEHICLE FAILED TO START. THE VEHICLE WAS JUMPSTARTED AND DRIVEN TO JIM REIHL'S FRIENDLY CHRYSLER JEEP (LOCATED AT 32899 VAN DYKE AVE, WARREN, MI 48093, (888) 834-3916) TO BE DIAGNOSED, BUT THE MECHANIC WAS UNABLE TO RETRIEVE A FAULT CODE OR DUPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 5,000.

BACK UP CAMERA NOT WORKING, HAS BEEN TO THE SHOP TWICE FOR REPAIR. 1ST TIME WAS SOFTWARE UPDATE, DIDN'T RESOLVE AS STILL WORKING RANDOMLY, 2ND TIME U05 RECALL , AGAIN DID'T WORK, WILL BE TAKING TO DEALERSHIP AGAIN FOR RESOLUTION. STARTED DAY AFTER PURCHASE, AND HAS BEEN GOING ON NOW 4 MONTHS

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. UPON STARTING THE VEHICLE, THE CONTACT SHIFTED THE GEAR SELECTOR INTO DRIVE AND AN UNKNOWN WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. ALSO, WHEN THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED, THE VEHICLE SEIZED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DISCOVERY CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM (1163 WARDS RD, ALTAVISTA, VA 24517, 434-369-6681) FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING AND REPAIRS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 12,600.
BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER IS DEFECTIVE. MASTER CYLINDER LOOSES PRESSURE. WHEN STATIONARY.

2017 CHRYSLER 300 AWD. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO THE CONFIGURATION OF HEATED SEATS. *LD    THE CONSUMER REQUESTED TO HAVE THE HEATED SEATS DISABLED AS THEY ARE VERY UNCOMFORTABLE AND CAUSED THE DRIVER TO BE DISTRACTED WHILE DRIVING. *JS

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. WHILE DRIVING UNKNOWN SPEEDS WITH THE HIGH BEAM HEADLIGHTS ACTIVATED, THE LIGHTS FAILED TO WORK WHEN THE OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE WAS FIVE DEGREES BELOW. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO MIKE MOTORS IN ELY (908 E SHERIDAN ST, ELY, MN 55731) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THERE WAS NO REMEDY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND OPENED CASE NUMBER: [XXX]. NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE WAS PROVIDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 12,074. *TT    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE HEADLIGHTS DID NOT ILLUMINATE ENOUGH (WHEN MAKING LEFT OR RIGHT TURNS) TO ACCOMMODATE HIS PERIPHERAL VISION. THE VEHICLE REMAINED WITH AN UNKNOWN DEALER LOCATION FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE DEALER DETERMINED THAT THERE WAS NO ABILITY TO ADJUST THE HEADLIGHTS BECAUSE OF THE DESIGN. THE MANUFACTURER AGREED WITH THE DEALER. THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 5,000.

THE RADIO STARTED HAVING ISSUES WITH THE REAR VIEW CAMERA. DID A SOFT RESET AND WORKED UNTIL TODAY. THE SCREEN ONLY SHOWS "LOADING NAVIGATION" AND THE REAR VIEW CAMERA IS NOT WORKING. A SOFT RESET DID NOT REPAIR THE PROBLEM.  I JUST BOUGHT THE CAR 4 MONTHS AGO AND HAVING ISSUES WITH IT...UNBELIEVABLE
LREAR CAMERA LOCKS UP ON SCREEN AND YOU CAN NOT DO ANYTHING WITH COMPUTER,VEHICLE MUST BE TURNED OFF AND RESTARTED
SUNROOF SHATTTERED OUT OF NOWHERE. CAR HAD BEEN PARKED GOT IN BACKED OUT AND SIRI OF GLASS JUST POPPED  AND SHATTERED
